name: Karma Kiss
text: Unlock this magical bow to send extra Karma Hearts to your mates. After use, the bow needs some time to recharge.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) and aim somewhere until the shot is ready and release to send some looooove in the air for others to catch.

name: Dance Move
text: Unlock a dance move for everybody.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to deploy your dance move and make your teammates smile.

name: Super Move
text: Unlock the super dance move for everyone.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to deploy your super dance move and make your teammates jealous.

name: Emote Wheel
text: Display a variety of Emotes above your head to communicate with others.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to display the wheel, pick an Emote by pointing at it, then release to communicate.

name: Survival Time I
text: Add 2 extra seconds to the time before you vanish while alone.
unlockedText: 2 bonus seconds were added to your survival time.

name: Survival Time II
text: Add 2 extra seconds before vanishing when disconnected from others.
unlockedText: 2 bonus seconds were added to your survival time.

name: Emote Pack I
text: Additional ways to communicate with your team.

name: Emote Pack II
text: Additional ways to communicate with your team.

name: Survival Time
text: Add 1 extra second to the time before you fade away.
unlockedText: 1 extra second was added to your survival time.

name: Electric Ghost
text: You can carry electricity as a ghost and help the team as if you were embodied.
unlockedText: You carry electricity also when in Ghost form.
